name: Laser Galaxy
description:
In this little game, you battle an onslaught of enemies with one weakness: laser beams. Try your best to complete all of the preset missions, or see what you can get your score to in Endless Mode.

I'd like to change some things and add some more to it, given my time permits. Enjoy!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse: Shoot

Shift: Pan Camera
